attributes.action: Give Ukrainians right to reside in the UK
attributes.additional_details: This morning (24/02/22) Russia invaded Ukraine. Many people will be fleeing Ukraine, we should let them live in the UK. Rather than send more people with weapons to their country we should share our space with them.
attributes.background: Let Ukrainians and people fleeing Ukraine, regardless of nationality, have right to reside in the UK.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
